channel.title: How to add drops to pking
channel.description: Im currently running mith-pkz a 508 server and its going great the only problem is when anyone pks their are no drops and they all yell at me,so im just wondering if any of u can tell me how i can add drops to pking. One guy did give me a code and he told me to put it into item.java but i searched item.java and came with grounditem, pickupitem, itemonitem, and something else. so if u can help id realllllyyyy apprecciiaatteee it thanx :)

item.title: How to add drops to pking
item.dc:creator: @mithpkz mithpkz
item.description:
@mithpkz wrote:

Im currently running mith-pkz a 508 server and its going great the only problem is when anyone pks their are no drops and they all yell at me,so im just wondering if any of u can tell me how i can add drops to pking. One guy did give me a code and he told me to put it into item.java but i searched item.java and came with grounditem, pickupitem, itemonitem, and something else. so if u can help id realllllyyyy apprecciiaatteee it thanx

Read full topic
item.source: How to add drops to pking
